pages.text: $(li)Kois are a new kind of fish that can be found only in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/blossom)Blossom Wood Forests$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you are near them, they will give you the Serenity effect preventing creatures from appears around you.$(br)$(li)They may drop a Koi upon death, you can eat them, but they are not very satiating.
